entry.title: Monday night: Chance of drizzle or rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 this evening then falling. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating before morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Temperature rising to plus 4 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
